summary:
A simple little mod that converts Cracked Tusk Keep into a player home

With a few customization options and a storage system.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/67106-1-1434861814.png[/img][/center]
[line]

Converts Cracked Tusk Keep into a player home

With a few customization options and a storage system.

To make the keep your home, you'll first have to kill the current lord inside the keep, once he's dead, the place is all yours.

if you have [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35470/?]MoonLight Tales[/url] check out the MoonLight Tales Patch that adds a potion that lets you turn into a werewolf without any hassle.

Dawnguard and Dragonborn are required.


[b][url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=465705823]P.S. also on steam[/url][/b]

[line]

[center]
